metadata.name: every inch of us - 01
metadata.description:
every inch of us is a series of digitally manipulated performative work where the artist and his working partner recorded and studied each other's bodies. Ezzam is constantly examining the body as the main medium in his art making. Like many of his other works, the absence and presence of the breathing body is important to his ongoing studies on gender roles and positioning in society. 

every inch of us - 01
Unique 
Dimensions: 1920 × 1080
10 seconds each in MP4 format
